name: Baldi's BASICS but the game doesn't take it seiriously
name_original: Baldi's BASICS but the game doesn't take it seiriously
description:
this is a 1.3.2 mod! 

i changed the game's code to make is easier!

principal lets you break any rule!

baldi is a bit slower (he doesn't really hate you)

playtime makes you jump 3 time (its a bug)

gotta sweep goes out of his closet again after he is done wandering around the school

arts and crafters comes after you when you got 2 notebooks (he is slower than he used to be)

first prize freezes if you see him.
